title: Roit Fix your Game!
body: Put the AP on items back down to normal, Leblanc's Bind circle is way to Big to get out of. Can you please just re-balance your game because its seriously broken. AM OVER IT example Lvl 2 nunu support with spell thief's should he be able to 2 hit others supports with Q? of course not.

replies.body: Yeah because nunu can use Q on champs ;^)
